page.title: 17Children's Leisure.
page.content:
Most children enjoy watching television. Favourite programmes are: Chips; Mad Death ; Tom and Jerry; The Young Ones and Hunter. Many like to draw and some like to read adventure stories or non-fiction books. Sport is popular, especially swimming. Some children own ponies which they enjoy riding. Others play cricket, squash and mini-rugby. Most of the children own bicycles and like riding them to visit their friends. Other children make collections of dolls, stamps, rubbers, coins and post-cards.
.
